experimentalFeatures.description: By enabling this experimental feature all monitor events will be added to the system log
experimentalFeatures.label: Log monitor events
experimentalFeatures.name: LOG_MONITOR_EVENTS

experimentalFeatures.description: By enabling this experimental feature you should be able to directly control A/V products from the web panel.
experimentalFeatures.label: Enable A/V control from web panel
experimentalFeatures.name: WEBPANEL_AV_CONTROL

experimentalFeatures.description: Use tunein API to search for stations on AV_RENDERER 'Playqueue add TuneIn station' command editor.
experimentalFeatures.label: Use TuneIN API
experimentalFeatures.name: QUERY_TUNEIN

experimentalFeatures.description: By enabling this experimental feature you will be able to upload custom favourites icons to the BLGW. The icons will be uploaded to the gateway but they will not be part of the configuration, you should manually backup them.
experimentalFeatures.label: Upload of favourites icons
experimentalFeatures.name: UPLOAD_FAVOURITES_ICONS

experimentalFeatures.description: By enabling this experimental feature you will be able to create and use ambients.
experimentalFeatures.label: Enable ambients
experimentalFeatures.name: ENABLE_AMBIENTS

experimentalFeatures.description: Allows to define a custom timezone using POSIX TZ enviroment variable format on [Setup -> Date & Time] page.
experimentalFeatures.label: Custom timezone
experimentalFeatures.name: CUSTOM_TZ

experimentalFeatures.description: By enabling this, it could be possible to add systems that are marked as experimental.
experimentalFeatures.label: Enable to add experimental drivers.
experimentalFeatures.name: ENABLE_EXPERIMENTAL_DRIVERS
